steps.title: Remove Old Bearing
steps.description: Use bearing puller to remove worn bearing. Inspect shaft for damage.
steps.notes: Check shaft for scoring or wear marks

steps.title: Clean Shaft
steps.description: Clean shaft thoroughly with solvent. Ensure no debris remains.

steps.title: Install New Bearing
steps.description: Press new bearing onto shaft. Ensure proper seating.
steps.notes: Apply light oil to bearing before installation

steps.title: Final Inspection
steps.description: Verify bearing is properly seated and rotates freely.
steps.notes: Check for smooth rotation with no binding
